summary: Provides the inference schedule for denoising diffusion implicit models (DDIM), handling timestep selection, beta schedule computation, and a suite of numerical stability options (clipping, thresholding, alpha handling) to convert model outputs into progressively denoised samples.
business_intent: Enables developers to generate high‑quality synthetic data (e.g., images) from diffusion models with configurable speed‑quality trade‑offs and robust numerical behavior, supporting diverse deployment scenarios.
